conclusion: Determine if Car A is ahead or behind Car B at t = 10 seconds by comparing distances traveled.
Car A's velocity increases linearly from 0 to 40 m/s over 10 seconds.
Calculate distance for Car A as area under v-t graph: Distance_A = 200 meters.
Car B's velocity increases linearly from 0 to 20 m/s over 20 seconds, reaching 20 m/s at t = 10 seconds.
Calculate distance for Car B as area under v-t graph: Distance_B = 100 meters.
Compare distances: Car A has traveled 200 meters, Car B has traveled 100 meters.
Car A is ahead of Car B by 100 meters at t = 10 seconds.
